Summary: St charles is a hotspot lately
divs: sighting detailsi wish i heard simalar stories to know if im not going crazy. it started 6-12-07 in the summer i get drunk at the courtyard at the marriot, i said a prayer out loud requesting to see ufos. one week later on this date im brainwashed i turned the area into a nightly hotspot the military picked up on this and ive seen strange airplanes with big satellites spinning circles around the area on a nightly basis , although lately its been quiet since new years, i think my prayer made the us government just waste probably over a million dollars in jet fuel in the last 6 months. ive never seen anything like these floating orbs, its almost like starring at a ghosts orb, it has no rules of latitude or langitude ive starred at these things for hours and i think that was it, i know were related to ras family, we domument these things, i think it comes from theyre heart, they love ra sungods family. i heard theyre voices in my head im not stupid. anyways the point was proven it is over, while i suffer in chicago areain poverty treating 10 dollars like it is a lot of money, the government blows over 1 million dollars in jetfuel chasing after the same lights every night, it obviously wasnt getting anywhere with these mufon morons, but i think they were trying to take pictures although i saw the us planes get only so close to them before they turned off theyre lights and scrammed. that was the funniest thing, i knew that was a ufo and one of my friends of ra that night and this big old sattelite plane sped dreictly twrds it. i smiled as the funny light over my house everynight flipped its switches and put up theyre middle finger as the us government while people suffer in poverty they blow millions in jetfuel under skeptism, research of what they do not own, and untrust in our god jesus christ. as if we are not under good hands for a reason"? in a way were not, but, it is because of thieves like these government researchers. i still dont understand why they brought the us research department to st charles illinois, they made a big out of themsevles, i watched the ufos and planes over my house everynight in poverty. i prayed with my hand together asking for this, but i didnt expect them to make a point to me that theyre acting like were not in good hands. maybe were not in good hands because of people like those government planes, who just blew over a million dollars and attatining obviously nothing but images of a light that was too bright to get a good pictures, and yet turned off its lights and leaves every time they got too close to it. after the first week of this happening every night here, they should of learned theyre lesson perhaps in arizona, knowing that getting too close to those things only makes them flick theyre middle finger switching off the lights. im sure arizona is billions of dollars wasted under them trying to attain a ufo , while they abuse power under representation on the government military and democracy i dont think so buddy, this is ra sungods family...the fact of dollars they have wasted on chasing a broken record while theyre own world \country suffers in poverty answears the us govrn questions as no, you cannot have a ufo , you just abused youre power under control of democracy under wasting money and abusing powers act f the government amen. in the name of the father and of the son and of the holy spirit, amen.
